content.value: public static object? ConvertArgument(object? arg, Type type)
Public Shared Function ConvertArgument(arg As Object, type As Type) As Object

parameters.description: The target type for the conversion.

children.summary: Converts an argument into its target type. Can be particularly useful when pulling attribute constructor arguments, whose types may not strictly match the parameter type.

parameters.description: The target types for the conversion.
